quote: You turn me on.” He cups my face, brushing my hair away from my eyes and a tear off my cheek.”“God, you turn me on. You're driving me crazy. I want you to need my hands on you. Do you?
quote_letters: YOU TURN ME ON HE CUPS MY FACE BRUSHING MY HAIR AWAY FROM MY EYES AND A TEAR OFF MY CHEEKGOD YOU TURN ME ON YOURE DRIVING ME CRAZY I WANT YOU TO NEED MY HANDS ON YOU DO YOU
